results.title: Clinical Characteristics, Treatment Outcomes, and its Predictors Among Hospitalized Stroke Patients in Ambo University Referral Hospital, West Ethiopia: A Retrospective Hospital-Based Study
results.text_hl: Likely, 48 (53.6%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ from @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@ and 10 (50.0%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ from @DISEASE_Hemorrhagic_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D000083302 @@@hemorrhagic stroke@@@ were frequently discharged with @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@+@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: A cardiovascular polypill for secondary stroke prevention in a tertiary centre in Ghana (SMAART): a phase 2 randomised clinical trial

results.title: The influence of statin therapy on platelet activity markers in hyperlipidemic patients after ischemic stroke
results.text_hl: This association between platelet activity and statin therapy may be clinically important in reducing the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@. We investigated the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy on platelet activation markers (platelet @GENE_SELP @GENE_6403 @@@CD62P@@@, sP-selectin, and platelet-derived microparticles (PDMPs)) in hyperlipidemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@.
